author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...SMALL PILAR MOVING RAPIDLY WEST-SOUTHWESTWARD OVER THE OPEN EAST PACIFIC...
summary:
...SMALL PILAR MOVING RAPIDLY WEST-SOUTHWESTWARD OVER THE OPEN EAST PACIFIC...
 As of 10:00 PM CDT Thu Nov 2
 the center of Pilar was located near 10.7, -99.2
 with movement WSW at 22 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 998 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
